sentences.sContent: There was time enough to obliterate memories of how things once were for him.
sentences.sCn: 有足够的时间来抹掉他对过去的记忆。

remMethod.val: ob(去掉) + liter(文字) + ate → 去掉(文字等) → 涂掉， 擦掉

trans.tranOther: If you obliterate something such as a memory, emotion, or thought, you remove it completely from your mind
